content:
path /v3/ethereum/account/transaction/internal/address
operationid ethgetinternaltransactionbyaddress
parameters
description account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required true
schema
type string
description max number of items per page is 50
in query
name pagesize
schema
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
required true
description offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
type number
description type of ethereum testnet defaults to ethereumsepolia
in header
name xtestnettype
required false
schema
default ethereumsepolia
type string
summary get ethereum internal transactions by address
description 1 credit per api call
get ethereum internal transactions by address
responses
200
schema
type array
ethtxinternal
type object
properties
from
type string
description address of the sender
to
type string
description address of the receiver null when its a contract creation transaction
value
type string
description value transferred in wei
blocknumber
type number
description block number where this transaction was in
timestamp
type string
description time of the transaction in seconds
hash
type string
description hash of the transaction
input
type string
description the data sent along with the transaction
traceid
type string
description trace id
type
type string
description type of the transaction
errcode
type string
description error code
gas
type number
description gas provided by the sender
iserror
type string
description 1 if the transaction was not successful 0 otherwise
gasused
type number
description the amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone
contractaddress
type string
description the contract address created if the transaction was a contract creation otherwise null
description ok
tag_summary:
ethereum is a decentralized opensource blockchain with tatum you can access the most commonly used ethereum methods these methods bring a certain level of abstraction and are used for applications that communicate with the blockchain directly some of the methods are used alongside virtual accounts to connect the blockchain and a virtual account like generating a wallet or getting information about transactions
tatum supports the following ethereum networks

mainnet the primary public production blockchain
sepolia a proofofwork testnet and the default testnet for ethereum the testnet cryptocurrency has no value and you can obtain it from a faucet for example fauceth
title: 20_Ethereum_EthGetInternalTransactionByAddress_210.json
